Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kilpatrick
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses temp. rerouted via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick. Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Cicero, Augusta, Kostner, and Division due to, street blockage near Division/Kilpatrick.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC/Halsted
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to a mechanical problem. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to a mechanical problem.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
